item.description:
Your last chance to log flying time for 2009... A know, a Wednesday... but, c'monnnnn...

If the wx is good, let's take the trip just over the drink to KFOK It's only 110nm and just off Groton Ct. Fly right over Fishers Island... sort of....

This looks like an easy in and out of spot...

"...Now known as "The Cafe at Malloy," Tel. 631-288-5401. You can taxi directly to the restaurant, located at base of Control Tower...."

http://www.airnav.com...


http://www.adventurep...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Lunch at Westhampton? 110 nms
